author: Duplicate MarkvanderMeulen
post_text: February 17, 2013 at 3:26â€¯PM#1Is it possible to let the console search for specific fixturesExample:I got a rig with a couple of Vl2500 spots and Vl2500 wash, would it be possible to select the Vl2500 spots without "knowing" the exact fixture id's.With other words, is there a commandline function to select a specific fixturetype in the patch??Thanks in advanceMark
title: Let the console select fixturetypes
